 Materiality Assessment  
Facilitated  by our independent sustainability consultants, K&S’  sustainability matters were prioritized  
and assessed based on the Economic, Environmental, Social and Governance (E ESG) impacts of our 
operations. Through a four -step process ( summarized  in Figure 7), a total of nine matters , compris ing 
of five material  matters and four additional matters were selected for reporting . Figure 8 displays the 
finalized  materiality matrix and  the matters have also been  mapped to the relevant  GRI Standard topic 
in Figure 9.
